page.title: 14Religion in Guildtown Area.
page.content:
All of this area is in the Parish of St.Martin's. St.Martin's Church is the only one in the area. It is Church of Scotland by denomination. The Minister is the Reverend Mr. J. Shirra who also has a Church in Scone, six miles away. Mr.Shirra visits the local school almost every Tuesday afternoon.
Only six families in the school actually attend the Parish Church.
Others attend ones nearer their homes ( eg in Burrelton for those who live in Wolfhill) or those of their own denomination (eg Baptist, Methodist, R.C., Congregationalist.) Others prefer to go to Perth or Dundee where their parents attended.
There are two Moslem families in the area who have no Mosque anywhere near.
